title: Keyless locking systems
extract: A keyless entry system is an electronic lock that controls access to a building or vehicle without using a traditional mechanical key. ... A remote keyless system can include both a remote keyless entry system (RKE), which unlocks the doors, and a remote keyless ignition system (RKI), which starts the engine.
extract_html: A keyless entry system is an electronic lock that controls access to a building or vehicle without using a traditional mechanical key. ... A remote keyless system can include both a remote keyless entry system (RKE), which unlocks the doors, and a remote keyless ignition system (RKI), which starts the engine.
